U

updateCompany(Company) - Method in interface d.DAO.CompanyDAO
update a company (password, email) on the DB using its company.id as identifier
updateCompany(Company) - Method in class d.DAO.CompanyDbDAO
 
updateCompany(Company) - Method in class e.facade.AdminFacade
this method receives a Company object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that company on the DB by retrieving the existing company, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
updateCompanyIncome(Coupon) - Method in interface d.DAO.CompanyDAO
this method is used in order to keep track of companies' income generated from selling coupons.
updateCompanyIncome(Coupon) - Method in class d.DAO.CompanyDbDAO
 
updateCompanyWithId(long, String, String, String) - Method in interface d.DAO.CompanyDAO
## This is a UTILITY method ## update a company on the DB based on it's DB Id passed in as a parameter, along with the attributes to change.
updateCompanyWithId(long, String, String, String) - Method in class d.DAO.CompanyDbDAO
 
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface d.DAO.CouponDAO
update a coupon (everything BUT Id) on the DB
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class d.DAO.CouponDbDAO
 
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class e.facade.CompanyFacade
this method receives a Coupon object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that coupon on the DB by retrieving the existing coupon, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.

## This is a UTILITY method ## update a coupon on the DB based on it's DB Id.
updateCouponWithId(long, String, Date, Date, int, CouponType, String, double, String) - Method in class d.DAO.CouponDbDAO

update a customer (password only) on the DB.

updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in class e.facade.AdminFacade
